stories.title: Author Ibram X Kendi awarded MacArthur ‘genius grant’
Gopher Is Still Worth Checking Out

stories.text:
I have used scrum and I dont see it really helps people build the right product. There is so much jargon and cruft around it; planning poker, story points, scrum master etc..

Software quality of what is built in the scrum way seems poor as it does local optimization and doesnt focus on long term.. seems like some thing that would work for consultancies the best?

Simple Kanban seems more effective, do you feel the same way? Am I doing scrum wrong? Is scrum built to ensure that program managers / product managers have something to do?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you think Scrum is a sham?

stories.text: There is a lot of talk on SRE by design. How do you introduce SRE early in system architecture and design?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you introduce SRE in a new system design?
Facebook’s Documents About Instagram and Teens, Published

stories.text:
I’m looking for time series data that I can use to model vax and unvax as separate populations to calculate the rates of case/hospitalizations/death within each. Does such a data source exist?

Basically looking for data similar to that used in this study:

https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/70/wr/pdfs/mm7037e1-H.pdf
stories.title: Ask HN: Best data source for Covid outcome by vaccination status?
